name: Midnight Carnival
description: Midnight Carnival is a Visual Novel with a dark and disturbing story and theme.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows Vista / 7 / 8 Processor: 1.5Ghz Processor or better Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Integrated Graphics Chip Storage: 150 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows Vista / 7 / 8 Processor: Pentium 4 or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Integrated Graphics Chip Storage: 150 MB available space
